comment: друзианский проповедник толпе, если поднят HieronimusNurgle

languages.text: "Разложение благодатно, ибо что есть гниение как не копошение новой жизни на останках праведника? Кто мы такие, чтобы прерывать цикл жизни? Нет, мы должны принять сию истину и посвятить себя ей!"

"There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"
languages.original_text: "Разложение благодатно, ибо что есть гниение как не копошение новой жизни на останках праведника? Кто мы такие, чтобы прерывать цикл жизни? Нет, мы должны принять сию истину и посвятить себя ей!"

traits.locale_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to discontinue the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

"There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to discontinue the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

"There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever off the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

"There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

"There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

languages.text: “腐烂也同样是一种恩典，因为有德之人躯体上的腐烂，又何尝不是新生命的诞生呢？我们有什么资格切断生命的轮回？不，我们必须接受这样的事实，全身心地投入其中！”
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: “腐烂也同样是一种恩典，因为有德之人躯体上的腐烂，又何尝不是新生命的诞生呢？我们有什么资格切断生命的轮回？不，我们必须接受这样的事实，全身心地投入其中！”

languages.text: 「腐敗には恵みがある。腐敗とは、遺骸に新しい生命が宿ることではないか？命の循環を断ち切る資格など、我々にあるのだろうか？否。我々は真実を受け入れ、己の身を捧げなければならない！」
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: 「腐敗には恵みがある。腐敗とは、遺骸に新しい生命が宿ることではないか？命の循環を断ち切る資格など、我々にあるのだろうか？否。我々は真実を受け入れ、己の身を捧げなければならない！」

languages.text: «Hay misericordia en la descomposición, pues ¿qué es la putrefacción sino el bullir de nueva vida sobre los restos de una persona virtuosa? ¿Quiénes somos nosotros para interrumpir el ciclo de la vida? No, ¡debemos aceptar esa verdad y dedicar nuestra vida a ella!».
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: «Hay misericordia en la descomposición, pues ¿qué es la putrefacción sino el bullir de nueva vida sobre los restos de una persona virtuosa? ¿Quiénes somos nosotros para interrumpir el ciclo de la vida? No, ¡debemos aceptar esa verdad y dedicar nuestra vida a ella!».

languages.text: "Es liegt Gnade in der Verwesung, denn was ist die Fäulnis, wenn nicht das geschäftige Treiben neuen Lebens auf den Überresten einer tugendhaften Person? Wer sind wir, den Kreislauf des Lebens zu durchtrennen? Nein, wir müssen diese Wahrheit akzeptieren und uns Ihr verschreiben!"
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: "Es liegt Gnade in der Verwesung, denn was ist die Fäulnis, wenn nicht das geschäftige Treiben neuen Lebens auf den Überresten einer tugendhaften Person? Wer sind wir, den Kreislauf des Lebens zu unterbrechen? Nein, wir müssen diese Wahrheit akzeptieren und uns Ihr verschreiben!"

languages.text: « La décomposition n'est pas dénuée de grâce, car qu'est-ce que la putréfaction si ce n'est l'émergence d'une nouvelle forme de vie sur le corps des vertueux ? Qui sommes-nous pour interrompre le cycle de la vie ? Non, nous devons accepter cette vérité et lui consacrer nos vies ! »
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: « La décomposition n'est pas dénuée de grâce, car qu'est-ce que la putréfaction si ce n'est l'émergence d'une nouvelle forme de vie sur le corps des vertueux ? Qui sommes-nous pour interrompre le cycle de la vie ? Non, nous devons accepter cette vérité et lui consacrer nos vies ! »

languages.text: "Bedensel çürüme zarafettir. Nihayetinde çürüme, erdemli bir insanın kalıntılarından yeni bir yaşamın doğması değildir de nedir? Biz kimiz ki yaşamın döngüsünü keselim? Hayır, gerçeği kabul etmeli ve kendimizi ona adamalıyız!"
languages.original_text: "There is grace in decomposition, for what is rot if not the bustling of new life on the remains of a person of virtue? Who are we to sever the cycle of life? No, we must accept that truth and devote ourselves to it!"

traits.locale_text: "Bedensel çürüme zarafettir. Nihetinde çürüme, erdemli bir insanın kalıntılarından yeni bir yaşamın doğması değildir de nedir? Biz kimiz ki yaşamın döngüsünü keselim? Hayır, gerçeği kabul etmeli ve kendimizi ona adamalıyız!"
